title: Accessories
content:
ial Bosses, found in secret places or obtained as reward for completing special Quests. Legendary Accessories not only have powerful stats values, they usually have multiple effects granted to the wielder. Legendary Accessories are not as overpowered to let you win all your battles with no effort, but they will make your playthrough much easier.

All Accesories in Baldur's Gate 3

Amulets are a type of Accessories in Baldur's Gate 3. Amulets can be equipped in their designated inventory slot and
